greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle giving T(n,m) = number of necklaces of two colors with 2n beads of which m=1..n are black.
comment: Left half of even rows of triangle A047996 (with the leftmost edge discarded).
xref: Penultimate entries give binary necklaces of n-1 black beads and n+1 white beads, presumably A007595, antepenultimate entries give binary necklaces of n-2 black beads and n+2 white beads, presumably A003444.
results.author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Aug 03 2002
